mapper.insert: INSERT INTO com_log( log_id, log_type, title, create_by, create_date, remote_addr, user_agent, request_uri, method, params, exception ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remoteAddr}, #{userAgent}, #{requestUri}, #{method}, #{params,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{exception,jdbcType=CLOB} )
